data.name: Myngs at Jam Station
data.desc: Sir Christopher Myngs arrives at Jam in the Marston Moor, under orders to cruise Sp Main
data.note:
15 Jan 1656. Arrival at Jam / 4 May 1656. Assault of Rio de la Hacha [Colombia] / Jul 1657. Return to Lon / 2 Mar 1658. Return to Jam / 1659. Assaults of Cuman√°, Puerto Cabello, Coro / Return to Lon / Jan 1660. Return to Jam /
 20 Sep 1662. Gov of Jam commissions Myngs, on frigate Griffith, to attack Sp shipping, towns, forts, so they 'may be better inclyned to receive the settlement of a trade [ie accept Eng presence in WI]' /
 5 Oct 1662. Assault of Santiago de Cuba / 1663. Assault of Campeachey [Yuc] / mis-identified as Campechuela [Cuba] by DNB / 21 Aug 1663. Arrival at Lon /v DNB
